title: Light Shade.
content: Typically used as a background on lighter designs or as a text color on darker designs, this color is often blindingly white.

title: Light Accent.
content: A variation of the light shade to add visual interest to a design. Hues can vary greatly, but are generally on the light side.

title: Brand Color.
content: An eye-catching color that serves as the main brand identity. It should be used sparingly, yet be clearly recognizable.

title: Dark Accent.
content: Just like the light accent, it is often a slight variation of its shady counterpart.

title: Dark Shade.
content: An inverse of the light shade- serves as a background for a darker design or as a text color on lighter designs.
